author: wmtan
body: In preparation for removing framework support for deprecated auto_ptr arguments in put() calls, this pull request replaces the use of auto_ptr with unique_ptr in some Reco\* packages. Also, std::make_unique is used when appropriate. Also, there were a few cases where a reference to an auto_ptr was an input argument to a function, which is a bad practice because it obscures the possible transfer of ownership. This was corrected.
title: Use unique_ptr, not auto_ptr in some Reco* packages
